version_description:
We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.

We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.

New cool features have arrived! Also, we released a crazy game – Partymasters. Check App Store and download it now!

New features and content:
- full support for iPhone X
- 65 new crazy weapons - try them all!
- 7 new theme backgrounds for Buddy's room
- Buddy Lucky Slots with 2 free spins
- more gifts and features with any subscription!

Update now and enjoy the game!

We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
Bug fixes and various improvements.

Get more bucks and gold! Various bug fixes and performance updates.

Update now and enjoy!

We're happy to announce the Diamond subscription!
- 20 UNIQUE elements!
- 20 AWESOME outfits!
- Get gold and bucks EVERY day for absolutely FREE
- Remove ads from the game

Other features:
- FREE gold button!
- bug fixing and functionality enhancements

New cool features have arrived! Also, we released a crazy game – Partymasters. Check App Store and download it now!

New features and content:
- full support for iPhone X
- 65 new crazy weapons - try them all!
- 7 new theme backgrounds for Buddy's room
- Buddy Lucky Slots with 2 free spins
- more gifts and features with any subscription!

Update now and enjoy the game!
